contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 2 家庭情况 Family Status
面试官司辛迪在询问玛丽的家庭情况。

contents.title: 辛迪：能给我说说你的家庭情况吗？
contents.answer: Cindy: Could you tell me something about your family?

contents.title: 玛丽：好的。我家一共有5口人：父亲、母亲、哥哥、妹妹和我。
contents.answer: Mary: OK. There are fi ve people in my family: Father, mother, elder brother, younger sister and I.

contents.title: 辛迪：你的哥哥和妹妹还都在上学吗？
contents.answer: Cindy: Are your brother and sister still in school?

contents.title: 玛丽：我的哥哥已经工作了，妹妹还在上大学。
contents.answer: Mary: My brother has found his job and my sister is still in college.

contents.content: 在面试时，面试官通常会问到求职者的家庭情况。求职者应当注意的是，面试官并不是真的想了解或知道你的家庭隐私，他们其实是想通过你的介绍来判断你的某些情况。

contents.title: 辛迪：你父亲是做什么工作的？
contents.answer: Cindy: What does your father do?

contents.title: 玛丽：我父亲是个中学教师。
contents.answer: Mary: My father is a middle school teacher.

contents.title: 辛迪：你母亲呢？
contents.answer: Cindy: What about your mother?

contents.title: 玛丽：我的母亲是个家庭主妇。
contents.answer: Mary: My mother is a housewife.

contents.title: 辛迪：你结婚了吗？
contents.answer: Cindy: Are you married?

contents.content: 例如，如果面试官问你：“你的家人彼此之间相处的和睦吗？”这个时候，即使你们家正在吵架，或是存在其他的纠纷，你也不能说实话，要说“我的家庭一直很和睦，大家相处比较愉快”。这样说不是教你撒谎，而是为了给面试官留下一个好印象，让他们觉得：如果以后有机会和你共事的话，可能也会相处得很愉快。

contents.title: 玛丽：我还没有结婚，目前一个人住。
contents.answer: Mary: I am not married yet and I live alone now.

contents.title: 辛迪：你需要负担家里的生活开支吗？
contents.answer: Cindy: Do you need to support your family?

contents.title: 玛丽：不需要，我父亲和哥哥会负担的。
contents.answer: Mary: No, my father and brother are doing that.

contents.title: 辛迪：你现在已经毕业了吗？
contents.answer: Cindy: Have you fi nished school?

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，我已经毕业了。
contents.answer: Mary: Yes, I have already graduated.

contents.content: 又比如，如果面试官问你：“你有男朋友或女朋友吗？”你可以实话实说，但是最好再加上一句类似的话：“我们平时一直都忙于自己的工作，没有太多的闲暇时间相处。”如此一来，面试官就不会认为你可能会为此而影响自己的工作了。

contents.title: 1.我家总共有5口人：我的父母、姐姐、弟弟和我自己。
contents.answer: There are fi ve people in my family: my parents, elder sister, younger brother and myself.

contents.title: 2.我已经结婚了，有一个温柔的妻子和一个可爱的儿子。
contents.answer: I have been married, and I have a gentle wife and a cute son.

contents.title: 3.我父母都是老实的农民。
contents.answer: My parents are both honest peasants．

contents.title: 4.我的哥哥是一位司机。
contents.answer: My elder brother is a driver．

contents.title: 5.我的妻子是一名办公室职员。
contents.answer: My wife is an office worker．

contents.title: 6.我是去年结婚的。
contents.answer: I got married last year．

contents.title: 7.我和我的丈夫现在分居两地。
contents.answer: My husband and I live apart now．

contents.title: 8.我和我的父母住在一起。
contents.answer: I live with my parents．

contents.title: 9.我和我的妻子现在还不想要小孩。
contents.answer: My wife and I don't want to have a kid now.

contents.title: 10.我的女儿已经上小学了。
contents.answer: My daughter has been in primary school.

contents.content: office worker 公司职员，上班族
